      • add_user

        public boolean add_user(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)

            add user mechanism

        if user is invalid, forget about it if user is valid, and it exists, update it if its a new user, add a new user to table

        Parameters:
        password - the password we need to input
        username - the username we need to input
        Returns:
        if adding the new username was success

      • check_user

        public boolean check_user(java.lang.String username)

            checks if user exists, query is not that smart, gets an ENTIRE table and than checks

        if the user is there

        // on update will select USERNAME only

        Parameters:
        username - the username we want to check if it exists
        Returns:
        true if user exists, false if not

      • update_user

        public boolean update_user(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password)

        subroutine in charge of feeding information and database information to SQL abstraction on update queries

        Parameters:
        password - the password we want to update
        username - the username we want to find to update its password
        Returns:
        if successfull, true, else false

      • delete_user

        public boolean delete_user(java.lang.String username)

            subroutine in charge of feeding information and database information to

        SQL abstraction on delete queries

        Parameters:
        username - the username we want to delete
        Returns:
        if delete was successfull, returns true

      • get_entire_db

        Returns:

      • get_user_by_id

        public User get_user_by_id(java.lang.String username)

        subroutine that is in charge of getting the user class by query

        Parameters:
        username - the user we want to find
        Returns:
        null if user was not found, if user was found we return a User dataclass representing it
